name: py-formulaic

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Formulaic is a high-performance implementation of Wilkinson formulas for
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-hatch-vcs
dependencies.description: Hatch plugin for versioning with your preferred VCS

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-astor
dependencies.description:
astor is designed to allow easy manipulation of Python source via the
AST.

dependencies.name: py-cached-property
dependencies.description: A decorator for caching properties in classes.

dependencies.name: py-graphlib-backport
dependencies.description: Backport of the Python 3.9 graphlib module for Python 3.6+.

dependencies.name: py-interface-meta
dependencies.description:
A convenient way to expose an extensible API with enforced method
signatures and consistent documentation.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-wrapt
dependencies.description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-pybids
dependent_to.description: bids: interface with datasets conforming to BIDS
